- Location: Side/rear yard along foundation; adjacent to chain-link fence.  
- Exterior/materials: Stucco wall; concrete steps; small window; chain-link fence; grassy lawn.  
- Vegetation: Patchy brown dry areas in lawn; tall grasses near fence/edge of yard.  
- Utilities: Exterior wiring/conduit running along wall; appears unsecured at ground level.  
- Observations/recommendations: Trim vegetation away from foundation; address lawn dry patches with irrigation; ensure proper grading/drainage away from the wall; verify exterior wiring for weatherproofing and securement.
